name: Mutiny!! - Elizabeth DLC
description:
Requires base game: Mutiny!!

This expansion brings you another new choice for First Mate: The bustling and busy moth, Elizabeth Margaret! As with the other first mates, giving her the job can lead the two of you into a dramatic relationship, and as you learn about her and what she wants out of life... well, she may be the type to avoid conflict, and to warn you she has a bit of a sharp edge! A new piece of the Mutiny!! story, new CGs and choices and visual novel excitement!

Content Warning

Features dickgirls, animal girls, spider girls, oviposition, animal anatomy on humanoid characters in a sexual and non-sexual context,  moths, wholesomeness, hyper-active canine companion.
